title.rendered: Western Digital employees build bicycles for children

content.rendered: Western Digital employees joined forces for a special Employee Engagement activity, building bicycles from scratch that were later handed over to children from Smile Foundation’s education centres. Many children often have to travel a long distance to school and the bicycles would provide an eco-friendly solution to this problem. This hands-on effort created a meaningful connection between the team and the cause, as they worked to bring joy to children.
